page.title: 13Ecology in Stock
page.content: One Day in June a group of our class went to Stock in the Mill Road area. We walked along a track between two hedges.The trees we saw were Hazel beech,Elder berry,Oak,Field maple and Holly.We saw Rye grass,Barley grass,Bent Timothy and Cats tail. The flowers we saw were:Dock nettles, Campion,Groundsel,Hedge bedstraw Cow parsley,Cocksfoot,Greater stitch wort,Chickweed,Ground Buttercup and Black bryony,which grew in a stretch of grass in front of the hedge.We Looked at a hedge in Whites Hill area of Stock.We measured 100 yards & found there were Hawthorn,Oak and Horse Chestnut Trees in it.We Estimated the Hedge is 300 years old.We Heard the birds singing and we saw Black Birds Thrush,Wagtail,Sparrow and Starlings and a Dead House Martin.
